name: Luckier
description:
Calypso is the luckiest cat in town!—that is, until she meets Philosopher Jones, who claims he's even luckier... 

Help our black cats grant good luck to the eight people of Greentown, who are currently sheltering in place.

GAME JAM

This prototype was made for Weekly Game Jam #141 based on the theme, "Good Luck." 

In addition, this is a participant in Themes+, including the bonus theme, "Darkness," as well as the design challenge, "Combine two 'opposite' genres." I took their suggestion of "a real-time turn-based game" seriously by making a time-based JRPG with a turn-based battle system.
